member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Call
member.summary: The Call APIs allow you to get the voice and video call states. It provides the list of CallHandle which can be used to get the information about call related actions.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Call.#ctor(Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle)
member.param: SlotHandle received in the Manager.Init API.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This exception occurs if the handle provided is null.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Call.PreferredVoiceSubscription
member.summary: Gets the current value for the preferred voice call subscription.
member.value: The currently set preferred voicecall subscription value.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Call.GetCallHandleList
member.summary: Gets the list of the current call.
member.returns: The list of the CallHandle for existing calls.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
In case of an invalid parameter.
In case of any system error.
In case of privileges not defined.
In case of out of memory.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle
member.summary: This class provides the APIs to get the information about calls.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle.HandleId
member.value: The ID of the call handle. 0 if unable to complete the operation.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle.Number
member.value: The number of the call. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle.Type
member.value: The type of the call.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle.Status
member.value: The status of the call.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle.Direction
member.summary: Gets whether the call is MO(Mobile Originated) call or MT(Mobile Terminated) call.
member.value: The direction of the call.
member.exception: This Exception can occur due to: 1. Operation Not Supported.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.CallHandle.ConferenceStatus
member.summary: Gets whether the call is a conference call or not.
member.value: The value whether the call is a conference call or not (true: Conference call, false: Single call).

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs
member.summary: This class contains the data related to the Notification event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.SimStatus
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the SIM card state changes. SIM.State will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.SimCallForwardingIndicatorState
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the SIM call forwarding indicator state changes. 'state(bool)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkServiceState
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the network service state changes. Network.ServiceState will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkCellid
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the cell ID changes. 'cell_id(int)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkRoamingStatus
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the roaming status changes. 'roaming_status(bool)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkSignalstrengthLevel
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the signal strength changes. Network.Rssi will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkNetworkName
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the network name changes. 'network_name(string)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkPsType
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the PS type changes. Network.PSType will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkDefaultDataSubscription
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the default data subscription changes. Network.DefaultDataSubscription will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkDefaultSubscription
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the default subscription changes. Network.DefaultSubscription will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkLac
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the LAC (Location Area Code) changes. 'lac(int)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkTac
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the TAC (Tracking Area Code) changes. 'tac(int)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkSystemId
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the system ID changes. 'sid(int)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkId
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the network ID changes. 'nid(int)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkBsId

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification.NetworkBsLongitude
member.summary: The notification to be invoked when the base station longitude changes. 'longitue(int)' will be delivered in the notification data.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Modem
member.summary: This class provides APIs to obtain information from the modem.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Modem.#ctor(Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle)
member.param: SlotHandle received in the Manager.Init API.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This exception occurs if the handle provided is null.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Modem.PowerStatus
member.summary: Enumeration for the Modem Power Status.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Modem.Imei
member.summary: Gets the IMEI (International Mobile Station Equipment Identity) of a mobile phone. The IMEI number is used by a GSM network to identify valid devices and therefore, can be used for stopping a stolen phone from accessing that network.
member.remarks: To avoid the unexpected behavior of old version applications that have http://tizen.org/privilege/telephony privilege. There is an exceptional handling in case of permission denied. For an application with API version 6 or higher, if an application doesn't have http://tizen.org/privilege/securesysteminfo privilege, it sets with empty string. For an application with API version lower than 6. if an application has http://tizen.org/privilege/telephony privilege, it sets with a pseudo value.
member.value: The International Mobile Station Equipment Identity. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Modem.CurrentPowerStatus
member.summary: Gets the power status of the modem.
member.value: The Modem power status (0=on,1=off,2=reset,3=low).

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Modem.Meid
member.summary: Gets the MEID (Mobile Equipment Identifier) of a mobile phone (for CDMA).
member.remarks: To avoid the unexpected behavior of old version applications that have http://tizen.org/privilege/telephony privilege. There is an exceptional handling in case of permission denied. For an application with API version 6 or higher, if an application doesn't have http://tizen.org/privilege/securesysteminfo privilege, it sets with empty string. For an application with API version lower than 6. if an application has http://tizen.org/privilege/telephony privilege, it sets with a pseudo value.
member.value: The Mobile Equipment Identifier. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network
member.summary: The Network class provides APIs to obtain information about the current telephony service network.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Network.#ctor(Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle)
member.param: SlotHandle received in the Manager.Init API.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This exception occurs if the handle provided is null.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network.Rssi
member.summary: Enumeration for the RSSI (Receive Signal Strength Indicator). Rssi6 indicates the highest strength.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network.ServiceState
member.summary: Enumeration for the network service states.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NameOption
member.summary: Enumeration for the network name priority.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NameOption.Spn
member.summary: The network name displayed by the SPN.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NameOption.Network
member.summary: The network name displayed by the Network.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NameOption.Any
member.summary: The network name displayed by the SPN or the Network.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network.DefaultDataSubscription
member.summary: Enumeration for the possible 'default' Data Subscriptions for the Packet Switched(PS).

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network.DefaultSubscription
member.summary: Enumeration for defining the possible 'default' Subscriptions for the Circuit Switched(CS).

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Network.SelectionMode
member.summary: Enumeration for the network selection modes.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.Lac
member.summary: Gets the LAC (Location Area Code) of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the GSM/WCDMA network.
member.value: The Location Area Code, -1 if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.CellId
member.summary: Gets the cell ID of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the GSM/WCDMA/LTE network.
member.value: The cell identification number, -1 if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.CurrentRssi
member.summary: Gets the RSSI (Received Signal Strength Indicator).
member.value: The Received Signal Strength Indicator. Higher the received number, the stronger the signal strength.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.RoamingStatus
member.summary: Gets the roaming state of the current registered network.
member.value: true if roaming, otherwise false if not roaming.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.Mcc
member.summary: Gets the MCC (Mobile Country Code) of the current registered network.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the GSM/WCDMA/LTE network.
member.value: The Mobile Country Code (three digits). The Mobile Country Code (MCC) identifies the country where the cell is being used. Empty string if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.Mnc
member.summary: Gets the MNC (Mobile Network Code) of the current registered network.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the GSM/WCDMA/LTE network.
member.value: The Mobile Network Code (three digits). The Mobile Network Code (MNC) identifies the mobile phone operator and the network provider. Empty string if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkName
member.summary: Gets the name of the current registered network.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the GSM/WCDMA/LTE network.
member.value: The name of the current registered network. Empty string if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkType
member.summary: Gets the network service type of the current registered network.
member.remarks: This API can be used in case the network is in service.
member.value: The network service type.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkPsType
member.summary: Gets the packet service type of the current registered network.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the HSDPA network.
member.value: The type of the packet service.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkNameOption
member.summary: Gets the network name option of the current registered network.
member.value: The network name display option.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkServiceState
member.summary: Gets the current network state of the telephony service.
member.value: The current network state.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkDefaultDataSubscription
member.summary: Gets the current default subscription for the data service (Packet Switched).
member.value: The current default data subscription.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkDefaultSubscription
member.summary: Gets the current default subscription for the voice service (Circuit Switched).
member.value: The current default voice subscription.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkSelectionMode
member.value: The network selection mode.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.Tac
member.summary: Gets the TAC (Tracking Area Code) of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the LTE network.
member.value: The Tracking Area Code. -1 if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.SystemId
member.summary: Gets the system ID of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the CDMA network.
member.value: The system ID. -1 if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.NetworkId
member.summary: Gets the network ID of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the CDMA network.
member.value: The network ID. -1 if unknown.

members.member:
Gets the base station ID of the current location.
3 http://tizen.org/privilege/location.coarse>
This API can be used in the CDMA network.
The base station ID. -1 if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.BaseStationLatitude
member.summary: Gets the base station latitude of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the CDMA network.
member.value: The base station latitude. 0x7FFFFFFF if unknown.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Network.BaseStationLongitude
member.summary: Gets the base station longitude of the current location.
member.remarks: This API can be used in the CDMA network.
member.value: The base station latitude. 0x7FFFFFFF if unknown.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Sim
member.summary: This class provides APIs that allow you to extract the information stored on a SIM card.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.#ctor(Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle)
member.param: SlotHandle received in the Manager.Init API.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This exception occurs if the handle provided is null.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.State
member.summary: Enumeration for the state of the SIM card.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.State.Unavailable
member.summary: The SIM is not available on this device.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.State.Available
member.summary: The SIM is available on this device (SIM is not locked).

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.State.Unknown
member.summary: The SIM is in transition between states.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.LockState
member.summary: Enumeration for the lock state of the SIM card.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.LockState.Unknown
member.summary: The SIM is not in lock.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.LockState.PinRequired
member.summary: The SIM is PIN (Personal Identification Number) locked.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.LockState.PukRequired
member.summary: The SIM is PUK (Personal Unblocking Code) locked.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.LockState.PermLocked
member.summary: The SIM is permanently blocked (All the attempts for PIN/PUK failed).

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.LockState.NckRequired
member.summary: The SIM is NCK (Network Control Key) locked.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.ApplicationType
member.summary: Enumeration for the type of the SIM card.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.IccId
member.summary: Gets the Integrated Circuit Card IDentification (ICC-ID). The Integrated Circuit Card Identification number internationally identifies SIM cards.
member.remarks: To avoid the unexpected behavior of old version applications that have http://tizen.org/privilege/telephony privilege. There is an exceptional handling in case of permission denied. For an application with API version 6 or higher, if an application doesn't have http://tizen.org/privilege/securesysteminfo privilege, it sets with empty string. For an application with API version lower than 6. if an application has http://tizen.org/privilege/telephony privilege, it sets with a pseudo value.
member.value: The Integrated Circuit Card Identification. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.Operator
member.summary: Gets the SIM Operator (MCC [3 digits] + MNC [2~3 digits]). The Operator is embedded in the SIM card.
member.value: The SIM Operator. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.Msin
member.summary: Gets the Mobile Subscription Identification Number (MSIN [9~10 digits]) of the SIM provider.
member.value: The Mobile Subscription Identification Number. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.Spn
member.summary: Gets the Service Provider Name (SPN) of the SIM card. Gets Service Provider Name embedded in the SIM card. If this value is not stored in the SIM card, an empty string will be returned.
member.value: The Service Provider Name. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.IsChanged
member.summary: Checks whether the current SIM card is different from the previous SIM card.
member.value: true if the current SIM card is different from the previous SIM card, otherwise false if the SIM card is not changed.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.CurrentState
member.summary: Gets the state of the SIM.
member.value: The current state of the SIM.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.ApplicationList
member.summary: Gets the count of an application on the UICC.
member.value: The masking value for below values are provided by the enumeration ApplicationType. 0 if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.SubscriberNumber
member.summary: Gets the subscriber number embedded in the SIM card. This value contains the MSISDN related to the subscriber. If this value is not stored in SIM card, an empty string will be returned.
member.value: The subscriber number in the SIM. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.SubscriberId
member.value: The subscriber ID. Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.CurrentLockState
member.summary: Gets the lock state of the SIM.
member.value: The current lock state of the SIM.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.GroupId1
member.summary: Gets the GID1 (Group Identifier Level 1). Gets Group Identifier Level 1 (GID1) embedded in the SIM card. If this value is not stored in SIM card, an empty string will be returned.
member.value: The GID1 (Group Identifier Level 1). Empty string if unable to complete the operation.
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Sim.CallForwardingIndicatorState
member.summary: Gets the call forwarding indicator state of the SIM. If the state is true, the incoming call will be forwarded to the selected number. State indicates the CFU (Call Forwarding Unconditional) indicator status - Voice (3GPP TS 31.102 4.2.64 EF CFIS).
member.value: The value whether the incoming call will be forwarded or not (true: forwarded, false: not forwarded).
member.precondition: The SIM state must be Available.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle
member.summary: This class provides APIs that provide functionality related to the slot handle.

member.name: E:Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle.ChangeNotification
member.summary: The event handler for receiving the Telephony state changes. This event will be triggered for the NotificationIds given in the SetNotificationId API.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle.SetNotificationId(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification})
member.summary: The notification IDs for which the ChangeNotification event will be triggered.
member.param: The list of notification IDs for which the ChangeNotification event will be triggered.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This Exception can occur due to: 1. Operation not supported. 2. Operation failed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.SlotHandle.RemoveNotificationId(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Tizen.Telephony.ChangeNotificationEventArgs.Notification})
member.summary: The notification IDs for which the ChangeNotification event will not be triggered.
member.param: The list of notification IDs for which the ChangeNotification event will be not be triggered.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This Exception can occur due to: 1. Operation not supported. 2. Operation failed.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.StateEventArgs
member.summary: This class contains the data related to the State changed event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Telephony.State.NotReady
member.summary: The telephony state is not ready.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.CallPreferredVoiceSubscription
member.summary: Enumeration for the preferred voice call subscription.

member.name: T:Tizen.Telephony.Manager
member.summary: This class provides APIs to initialize and deinitialize the framework. It also provides APIs to get the SlotHandles, which can then be used to get other Network/Sim/Call/Modem information.

member.name: E:Tizen.Telephony.Manager.StateChanged
member.summary: The event handler to be invoked when the telephony state changes.

member.name: P:Tizen.Telephony.Manager.CurrentState
member.value: The state value of telephony.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Manager.Init
member.summary: Acquires the number of available handles to use the telephony API.
member.returns: A list of telephony handles. You will get 2 SlotHandles in case of the dual SIM device. Where, SlotHandle at Index '0' represents the primary SIM and Index '1' represents the secondary SIM.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This exception will be generated in the following cases: 1. The system is out of memory. 2. If the operation is not supported on the device. 3. If the operation failed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Telephony.Manager.Deinit
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.
This exception can be generated in the following cases: 1. If the operation is not supported on the device. 2. If the operation failed.
